title: Please explain me this
body:
I did 7-1-7 my teammates 3-3-8 and 4-2-8.
I did 10353 damage they did 5005 and 8729.
I have a A+ and they have S- the two of them. 
How is that right? In what do you base on ? To give me an A+ and them an S- ??

replies.body: This happens all the time, I would play support and be like 2/4/17 but only get A+. Its broken I don't even pay it no mind at this point.
Really? S is usually reserved for deaths under 2 and almost always at 0 for support. Every role earns their S differently I suppose.
But i get what youre saying.

yeah but a diana in the jungle doing 7-1-7 and doing the most damage. Damn if that's not an S what is?? The truth is that my presence made us win the game what is more important then that. 
Dont understand really

i wasnt a support i was a jungle and did the most damage the most kills and still get and inferior grade.
That's not fair.
Just wanted to know what to they base on.
So that i have a A+ and them a S- and one of them was a Lulu support.

> [{quoted}](name=Ãbdul28,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yiPcmlIA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-28T03:03:36.384+0000)
>
> i wasnt a support i was a jungle and did the most damage the most kills and still get and inferior grade.
> That's not fair.
> Just wanted to know what to they base on.
> So that i have a A+ and them a S- and one of them was a Lulu support.

Supports average much lower in kills than a carry. Grades are based on your performance vs the average, not how hard you TDMed. The Lulu had a great Lulu game, while you merely had a good game for your respective champ/role.

It is based on more than KDA. Wards, CC, CS, objectives, general presence count for a lot.

 Most importantly, the score is based on averages for the champion you are playing, the role you are playing, at your matchmaking ELO. Someone playing Janna is not going to get 20 kills and 300 CS in a great game, but someone playing an ADC or top can.

Every champion+role has its own grade curve, which is why it is easier to get S ranks playing off-meta.
